title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize gen AI apps with semantic caching in Amazon ElastiCache (DAT451)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 中的语义缓存优化生成式 AI 应用程序 (DAT451)
abstract: Multi-agent AI systems now orchestrate complex workflows requiring frequent foundation model calls. In this session, learn how you can reduce latencies to single-digit milliseconds from single-digit seconds with vector search for Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey in agentic AI applications using semantic caching, while also reducing the cost incurred from your foundation models for production workloads. By implementing semantic caching in agentic architectures like RAG-powered assistants and autonomous agents, customers can create performant and cost-effective production-scale agentic AI systems.
abstract_cn: 多智能体AI系统现在可以编排需要频繁调用基础模型的复杂工作流。在本次会议中，了解如何在智能体AI应用程序中使用Amazon ElastiCache for Valkey的向量搜索进行语义缓存，将延迟从数秒级降低到个位数毫秒级，同时还能降低生产工作负载中基础模型产生的成本。通过在RAG驱动的助手和自主智能体等智能体架构中实施语义缓存，客户可以创建高性能且具有成本效益的生产规模智能体AI系统。
